# URLSessionWebSocketTask.Message

**Enumeration**

An enumeration of the types of messages sent and received.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Message
```

## Message types

- **URLSessionWebSocketTask.Message.data(_:)**: A WebSocket message that contains a block of data.
- **URLSessionWebSocketTask.Message.string(_:)**: A WebSocket message that contains a string.

## Sending and receiving data

- **send(_:completionHandler:)**: Sends a WebSocket message, receiving the result in a completion handler.
- **receive(completionHandler:)**: Reads a WebSocket message once all the frames of the message are available.
- **maximumMessageSize**: The maximum number of bytes to buffer before the receive call fails with an error.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
